title: La loi c'est la loi
overview: La loi c'est la loi is a satirical comedy confronting the limits of individual and collective freedoms in a so-called advanced society. The series features Steeve L'Heureux and Ã‰ric Contant, a duo of devoted police officers working for the SPTM. Their mission: clean up the city of Montreal and make the law shine.
